item.title: Research Paper
item.description: Abstract Currently, Diabetes and the associated Diabetic Retinopathy (DR) instances are increasing at an alarming rate. Numerous previous research has focused on automated DR detection from fundus photography. The classification of severe cases of pathological indications in the eye has achieved over 90% accuracy. Still, the mild cases are challenging to detect due to CNN inability to identify the subtle features, discrimnative of disease. The data used (i.e. annotated fundus photographies) was obtained from 2 publicly available sources â€“ Messidor and Kaggle.

item.title: IPL Score Prediction
item.description: This tool helps the user to predict the runs of ipl matches. The dataset is downloaded from kaggle and it has approx 11k training examples and around 3k testing examples. Engineered features from the text to quantify the value and see on which features the flight price is more dependent. Removing the same features which are highly correlated so to avoid curse of dimensionality. Optimized Random Forest Regressors using RandomizedsearchCV to reach the best model.

item.title: Delhi Airport Flight Price Estimator
item.description: Created a tool that helps user to predict the price of the flight. The dataset is downloaded from kaggle and it has approx 11k training examples and around 3k testing examples. Engineered features from the text to quantify the value and see on which features the flight price is more dependent. Removing the same features which are highly correlated so to avoid curse of dimensionality. Optimized Random Forest Regressors using RandomizedsearchCV to reach the best model.
